# changeToMode(with:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Command ChangeToMode

## Declaration

```swift
func changeToMode(with params: MTRRefrigeratorAndTemperatureControlledCabinetModeClusterChangeToModeParams, completion: @escaping (MTRRefrigeratorAndTemperatureControlledCabinetModeClusterChangeToModeResponseParams?, (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func changeToMode(with params: MTRRefrigeratorAndTemperatureControlledCabinetModeClusterChangeToModeParams) async throws -> MTRRefrigeratorAndTemperatureControlledCabinetModeClusterChangeToModeResponseParams
```

## Discussion

This command is used to change device modes. On receipt of this command the device SHALL respond with a ChangeToModeResponse command.
